Class Meal

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Ingredient>
          • akly.Meal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Ingredient>, java.util.Collection<Ingredient>, java.util.List<Ingredient>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class Meal
extends java.util.ArrayList<Ingredient>
    This class represents a combination of ingredients, in other words a meal.
    Version:
    v0.1
    Author:
    Adam Nafie
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
